overview: Mr. Efi Cohen-Arazi has over twenty years of experience in the biotech/pharma industry in the areas of drug development and business and company management. Until July 2006, he was the CEO of Intec Pharma, Israel, a drug development company. Previously, Mr. Cohen-Arazi was VP Corporate Manufacturing, Head of Contract Manufacturing and Site Head at Thousand Oaks, California-based Amgen Corporation, where he established and led several global strategic partnerships for development and manufacturing of small molecules and biopharmaceuticals. Mr. Cohen-Arazi has held a variety of leadership positions at Immunex, Seattle, WA, and with the Serono Group in Switzerland and Israel. Mr. Cohen-Arazi holds BSc and MSc degrees in Agriculture and Microbiology from the Hebrew University of Jerusalem.
